resources.name: 988 Suicide & Crisis Lifeline
resources.description: Free, confidential emotional support for people in suicidal distress or emotional crisis, 24 hours a day, 7 days a week

resources.name: Crisis Text Line
resources.description: Free, 24/7 crisis counseling via text message. Trained counselors help with depression, anxiety, eating disorders, abuse, and more

resources.name: Emergency Services (911)
resources.description: Call 911 for immediate life-threatening emergencies, including active suicide attempts or when someone is in immediate physical danger

resources.name: NAMI HelpLine
resources.description: Information, resource referrals and support for people living with mental health conditions and their families

resources.name: SAMHSA National Helpline
resources.description: Treatment referral and information service for individuals and families facing mental health and/or substance use disorders

resources.name: The Trevor Lifeline
resources.description: Crisis intervention and suicide prevention services for LGBTQ+ young people under 25

resources.name: National Domestic Violence Hotline
resources.description: 24/7 confidential support for anyone experiencing domestic violence, seeking resources or information, or questioning unhealthy aspects of their relationship

resources.name: National Sexual Assault Hotline
resources.description: Free, confidential support for survivors of sexual assault and their loved ones

resources.name: Trans Lifeline
resources.description: Crisis hotline staffed by transgender people for transgender people

resources.name: Veterans Crisis Line
resources.description: 24/7 crisis support for veterans and their families and friends

abuse_trauma.description: Resources for abuse and trauma survivors

general_support.description: General mental health information and support

suicide_risk.message: Your safety is the most important thing right now. Please reach out to these crisis resources immediately.

self_harm.message: I'm concerned about your safety. These resources can provide immediate support and guidance.

domestic_violence.message: Your safety is paramount. These specialized resources can help you develop a safety plan.

substance_crisis.message: Substance abuse crisis requires immediate attention. These resources specialize in addiction support.

metadata.description: National mental health and crisis support resources
metadata.usage_notes: Always prioritize user safety. Provide multiple options when possible. Verify resource availability and contact information regularly.
